fields.Name: Airtable Powersave

Image.filename: Copy of Copy of Copy of Copy of Untitled Design (2).png

fields.Description (from Notion):
I created this[ browser extension](https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/airtable-powersave/haenikbhamhcofblbialbabhlimabade) to be able to save to [Airtable](https://airtable.com/) quickly right from the browser. [Powersave](http://powersave.pro/) is an advanced web clipper with AI capabilities that allows you to quickly save to the any base and table in Airtable.

**Features**
ðŸ’¾ Save data to any base and table
âœ¨ Use AI to extract and categorize information for you, no matter what your table structure is like
âœ¨ Create new Airtable tables in seconds with AI assistance
ðŸ”² Quickly narrow down a portion of the screen for more precise extraction
â™¾ Unlimited saved websites
ðŸ”— Autofill URLs, images, headers, descriptions, and more
ðŸ–¼ Take screenshots

**Usecases**
âš¡ Save websites - portfolios, competitors, any other websites
âš¡ Content management - quickly add new content and update existing content. Quickly manage Airtable content for Softr, Glide and other websites using Airtable as backend
âš¡ Content auditing - review content under different URLs and quickly save notes
âš¡ Social media - save information about followers, posts
âš¡ Products - save products of any kind and categorize it to Airtable
âš¡ Migrations - transfer content from legacy websites to migrate to new structures
âš¡ Quickly add any Airtable record right from the browser

CTA.value: Want to save and categorize web content effortlessly with AI, or build something else?
